nodes.name: OpenMW Visible Rings
nodes.summary: NEW: Support for rings from Unique Jewelry Redone by Remiros. Wear glasses and goggles while keeping your hair on! See your equipped rings as visible objects on your fingers.

nodes.name: OpenMW Dynamic Ambient Visual Effects
nodes.summary: Now under a new name! NEW : Floating dust in tombs and crypts. This mod adds ambient visuals: Smoking candles, lightning strikes, moths around lanterns, and more.

nodes.name: OpenMW Impact Effects
nodes.summary: UPDATE: Preview camera mode now properly supported. Adds visual effects and sounds when you hit objects in the world. For OpenMW 0.49.

nodes.name: OpenMW Distant Ebonheart - Experimental
nodes.summary: Makes Ebonheart render as a single object in the Distant Land view, so that it no longer has missing building pieces when far away. Requires a mostly Vanilla Mod list for compatibility. Currently experimental.

nodes.name: OpenMW More Dynamic Water Meshes
nodes.summary: Adds distortion effects to the  water meshes from Tamriel Rebuilt and OAAB data, giving the illusion of a 3D animated water surface.

nodes.name: OpenMW Dynamic Actors
nodes.summary: UPDATE: Background blur and widescreen camera effects during dialogue. Unpaused dialogue with dynamic camera control, and enhanced Idle animations for NPC's. Customize player Idle animation, or use playlist function to animate player in any

nodes.name: OpenMW Lua helper utility
nodes.summary: UPDATE: Tamriel Rebuilt voiced dialogue ESP to support TR release 25.06.28 hotfix. Support mod for use by other OpenMW lua Mods. Requires OpenMW 0.49.

nodes.name: OpenMW Animated Pickup and Shop Around
nodes.summary: UPDATE: Added the features from Shop Around by Merlord. Supports item animations for Quickloot by OwnlyMe. Based on MWSE Animated Pickup by C3pa, telekinesis style effect when picking up items. Plus Sneak to Steal, block accidental thievery

nodes.name: Flight Animated for OpenMW
nodes.summary: UPDATE: Fix for a bug conflict with the mod ReAnimation v2 Rogue. Why Walk when you can Fly? A more suitable flying animation for when you're levitating in Morrowind.

nodes.name: OpenMW vanilla candles patched with Enlightened Flames and ILFAS
nodes.summary: A basic drop in replacer of the vanilla candle models, combining lighting and material improvements from Improved Lights for All Shaders, and the realistic candle flames from Enlightened Flames.

nodes.name: OpenMW Skyrim Style Quest Notifications
nodes.summary: *NEW* Notification banners for New Location Discovered. Add popup notifications when you start or finish a quest, or discover new locations, in the style of Skyrim. Based on nazz190's MWSE Skyrim Style Quest Notifications. Requires OpenMW

nodes.name: OpenMW Voices of Vvardenfell patch
nodes.summary: NEW version for Full Working of Kezyma's Voices of Vvardenfell, all dialogue now playable. OpenMW 0.49 only.
